info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 12 at 11:23AM EST until February 12 at 7:00PM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST /6 PM CST/ THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Lake effect snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 2 inches bringing storm total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches since last night. * WHERE...In Indiana, La Porte County. In Michigan, Berrien County. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST /6 PM CST/ this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Lake effect snow showers may persist into tonight across Berrien County.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
